channel.title: New York City on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in New York City on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: We Can Dance If We Want To
item.description: New York City has long been known as a fairly progressive place, one known as welcoming to ethnic and cultural groups long marginalized by society. So it’s surprising that the city’s laws regarding dancing are more appropriate for a small town in an ‘80s movie. The city’s long, strange aversion to dancing is finally expected to come to an end on October 31st when a prohibition-era law is expected to be repealed.

item.title: Stable Rent
